page.title: 07Biography. Education.
page.content: accidents with children running across the main road of the village. School dinners are thought of by Mr.Offer as good value for money, but most children have a sandwich meal. If Mr.Offer had one million pounds he would spend it on things like a sports centre, new hall, radios and televisions in every room, a coffee machine and an answering system for the office, carpets and curtains in classes, more teachers and a mini-bus. {The Staff at the School are:}Deputy Headmaster- Mr. Johnson, Class Six-Miss. Morrall, Class Five-Mrs. Pritchard, Class Four- Mrs.Bridges, Class Three- Mrs. McAbendroth, Class Two-Mrs. Sherfield, Class One- Mrs. Corrigan, Secretary- Mrs Griffen, Caretaker- Mr. Heffernan, Cleaner-Mrs. Churchill, Welfare Assistant- Mrs.Nokes.
